titleSection.name: Tasktop Dev for VersionOne
titleSection.shortDescription: View and update VersionOne workitems directly from your Visual Studio or Eclipse IDE.

descriptionSection.description:
Tasktop Dev for VersionOne integrates VersionOne's agile planning and project management platform with Visual Studio and Eclipse IDEs. This integration provides developers with the ability to create and manage VersionOne Epics, Stories, Defects, Tasks, and Tests (including effort tracking) all within the context of their IDE.

**Features**

* Search, filter, view, and update your epics, stories, defects, tests, and tasks from Eclipse or Visual Studio
* Changes since your last view are highlighted for easy review
* Use a one-time search or add  a query to your task list
* Track and report effort on each work item

**Benefits**

* Stay on top of your VersionOne stories, defects, tests, and tasks without leaving your IDE
* Up-to-date visibility of project status and risks
* Use queries and notifications to stay informed of your teamâ€™s progress
* Access your VersionOne workitems while offline
